title:
Relative leftmost path principles and omega-model reflections of
  transfinite inductions
abstract:
In this paper, we show that the omega-model reflection of $\Pi^1_{n+1}$
transfinite induction is equivalent to Towsner's $\Sigma^0_n$ relative leftmost
path principle $\Sigma^0_n\mathsf{LPP}$ over $\mathsf{RCA}_0$ for $n > 1$. As a
consequence, we have that $\Sigma^0_{n+1}\mathsf{LPP}$ is strictly stronger
than $\Sigma^0_{n}\mathsf{LPP}$.
